alert.note: Alert for Jim Hogg; Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 23 at 4:46PM CDT until March 24 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...POSSIBLE ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR ZAPATA, JIM HOGG AND STARR COUNTIES... .The passage of a dry line from west to east on Friday morning will bring much lower humidity and moderate to gusty northwest winds Friday afternoon. When combined with cured fuels, severe to extreme drought conditions and hot temperatures, this could lead to the rapid and erratic spread of wildfires. Conditions improve by sunset Friday as winds diminish. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS, CURED FUELS, AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE RIO GRANDE PLAINS AND NORTHERN RANCHLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Zapata, Jim Hogg and Starr. * TIMING...Noon to 6 PM Friday. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 90s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
